ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: There ARE! girls that play..(not to shout it out or anything just pointing it out!) Ok?...Does that answer your question? Or should I say his question......My
ygData.messageBody:
There ARE! girls that play..(not to shout it out or anything just pointing it out!) Ok?...Does that answer your question? Or should I say his question......My friend also plays...she's Tenani the druid......very pretty and nice high lvl  at least for me!! bye


Richard <soulfire18_01@...> wrote:
Me and my friend were having a discussion the other night while he
was playing eq, he was talking to his eq wife, and i was messing
with him, and if brought up the questions of, are there really girls
that play eq, or are the all guys. Then he asked me, if there are
girls that play, are they cute? Just curious.
